responsibilities: Performs moderately complex development activities, including the design, implementation, maintenance, testing, and documentation of software modules and subsystems
Performs moderately complex bug verification, release testing, and beta support for assigned products
Researches problems discovered by QA or product support and develops solutions
Understands the marketing requirements for a product, including target environment, performance criteria, and competitive issues
Works under the general supervision of a development manager
skills: Working experience with software design and development methodologies
Demonstrated experience with C++ and Python
Ability to collaborate with others in a geographically distributed team
qualifications: BS in Engineering, Computer Science, or related field with 2 years' experience or MS
MS in Engineering or Computer Science (preferred)
Experience as a software developer working with AI/ML, including data science aspects, implementation of appropriate ML algorithms, model packaging/deployment, and LLMs (preferred)
Experience in a large-scale commercial software development environment (preferred)
